website_summaries.verdict: A prime choice for a large, heavy-duty salt lamp. It stands out with a bold peach-toned glow that can be used for both its health benefits and a statement piece.
pros: A massive size that is excellent for both decor purposes and those looking for the natural health benefits of salt lamps
cons: Packaging could be improved to prevent breakage during transport
It also lacks a dimmer switch

customer_reviews.title: Plastic around bulb....
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful when you get this. If there is a piece of plastic on the bottom, remove the 3 screws that hold the bulb in place and remove the plastic. I did not. I just thought it was part of the unit. My bulb went out. I went to see what wattage the bulb was and to my surprise there was plastic around the light bulb all this time. And it had melted and was black charred plastic. I am still surprised there wasn't a fire. Would have been nice if there was a note saying remove plastic from bulb before plugging in, but there wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Faith76

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps have made a seismic difference in allergies for me! We recently moved into a very nice townhouse complex. But for some reason, I suffered acute allergy reactions from something in the HVAC system. Having the vents professionally cleaned did not completely fix the situation. My daughter swears by these things so I thought I'd give them a try and oh my goodness! What a difference! Now I feel like I can't live without them. They have to be kept on 24/7 to be effective, so they are not suitable for a bedroom, but the two I have in our living room provide great ambiance with their warm glow. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged In Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in poor condition due to inadequate packaging by manufacturers and Amazon, both failed to protect the product. The salt lamp itself was more white than pink possibly naturally occurring or due to damage from shipping. It has pieces coming off and cracks but the light worked. It was a gift for someone who was over when the box arrived. They kept it even though I would have returned it. Not sure if it has real benefits but definitely interesting. *If you purchase this as a gift open it and check it before giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Vigg

customer_reviews.title: I'll use it until the power cord shorts again like the first one did
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first one due to the power cord with dimmer being defective. They replaced it at no charge, however when I received the replacement. it was cracked in half. I glued it together and it was working ok until recently. The power cord must have a short in it; When I turn it on, sometimes it works, but only when it is turned up high. Told packaging about it, never heard back. I'll use it until the power cord shorts again like the first one did. then I will go to another dealer to get a power cord and dimmer switch. I am to busy to deal with this again. Disappointed somewhat!
customer_reviews.author: keyman

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: I hardly got to use it. I had to buy 3 bulbs. The first time I used it, it worked for a month. But the bulb went out. So I bought another bulb. A day later it went out. Thought maybe it was the bulb so I bought another. That one worked a couple of days so I had high hopes. But that went out too. I was frustrated by this point. So I just bought another bulb for the heck of it and guess what? It only lasted 2 hours! Apparently other people's reviews say the same. It was pretty while it lasted but waste of time and money. Stay away from buying this brand
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this lamp truly has an health benefits (I hope it does), but regardless I love it. Gives off a nice warm glow. I thought it might get a little warmer to the touch in order to work. But I truly don't know. Works fine, hopefully will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: GiaR

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is perfect, I typically have a dry house so I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a night stand lamp for me, that happens to stay on all day at the dimmest setting. This lamp is perfect, I typically have a dry house so I haven't had any moisture or condensation issues. I love the soft glow, and just adjustable setting is perfect. My room is not huge but I feel like it is a little less musty without using something like a spay to cover up smells. I can't tell how functional it is as an air purifier (it might work a bit, no miracle worker here) but as an alternative looking light source it is gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: A. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure its... WORKING! I feel it- or is it all in my head?
customer_reviews.text: This is actually working! It's not all in my head, but ever since I had this turned on- I do feel more energized and less sluggish. This is incredible and definitely for anyone- especially those who are in to that whole "positive vibes" "spirituality" scene. It's a great decorative item and I paired it with a small buddha statue (about 8 inches tall) and it looks great in my living room. A little bit of zen. (:
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good product, satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of bad reviews here, which made me a little nervous after purchase but we didn't have any problems and we really enjoy it. It's a nice size, not too small and not extraordinarily large. The offput of light is what was desired, not too bright and gives a nice flow. It's relaxing, despite whatever Himalayan salt theories there may be. Not sure about those but the vibe is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Careful where you put this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beware if you live in a high humidity environment. These lamps will suck moisture out of the air, condense and then drip salt water all over the place. had one on a shelf over some electronics and came home from work to find salt water had dripped from the lamp into my stereo which of course fried the stereo. Other than that it's a very pleasing ambient room light.
customer_reviews.author: James Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.text: The light doesn't work any longer. I tried three different bulbs that I know are working, but this just doesn't work any more. Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: ... my TV on at night (which is just really bad for you)
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has helped me sleep without my TV on at night (which is just really bad for you). I've nipped that bad habit in the butt thanks to this lamp. I love this lamp...it's the perfect night light. I'll be ordering more for myself and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Jakybrwn1

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and adds a calming atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: I love these larger salt lamps, they are actually an orange color and so beautiful in any room just for the atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great night light! I have mine for about a year! No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Crum

customer_reviews.title: They are fragile...one of ours arrived broken into three peices
customer_reviews.text: They are all different, some very orange, some more pink, and one of ours is very white with a small amount of color at the top. We use them all over the house, but especially like the adjustable light we can use like night lights, up or down in the room my grandson uses when he is here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok I would spend more money on a salt lamp though
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty but, not what I expected. I thought it would nicer. When I opened the lamp was in one piece. Salt was rubbing off of it. It is not broken but, I wish I would of went with a different style. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great item, bright & useful
customer_reviews.text: I like it..it has an off & on switch. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: CarrolSue

customer_reviews.title: ... sure of the air cleansing claim but it's a nice piece for the house and effective night light
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of the air cleansing claim but it's a nice piece for the house and effective night light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: MOUNTAIN AIR FEELS JUST LIKE ATLANTIC OCEAN FEEL!
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference in the "feel" of my bedroom since I placed this lamp in the room. It releases ozone that makes the air feel as though I was back in Virginia Beach's Atlantic Ocean air. Feels cleaner and pure. Highly recommend this product. All of my bedrooms have one and guests tell me that the room feels so good!
customer_reviews.author: B. T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rock lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice 'natural lamp' especially for the price. The adjustable intensity switch is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Asthma
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the hospital several times due to asthma and this Salt Lamp has made a huge difference. I swear it has kept me out of the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Highlander

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of what you order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different salt lamps, two different prices and when I got them, they were the exact same item, box and all. I feel I was ripped off, sad !!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Have it on my patio really lights it up. Going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this brand
customer_reviews.text: The light stopped working after two days of use. I have read some other reviews that say the exact same thing so stay away from this salt lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I put this lamp in the living room and love the glow and within a couple of days the air was fresh I'm going to get my daughter one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blissett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the warm orange glow. The light doesn't get too hot, the dimmer works great. We leave it on 24/7 and my health has been better since getting it. I don't know if it's this or something else, but I am sold and will get another.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya bidness

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one of these. GREAT PRICE, GREAT QUALITY!!!! It was a dimmer switch that’s easy to use. AWESOME for a nightlight or decoration. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: MUCH Smaller than I expected. I got 2 and they were about the size or a normal roll of toilet paper or a grapefruit. I was expecting the larger ones I got before but they are still nice. Just Very small.
customer_reviews.author: I Fix-Umm

customer_reviews.title: No color, no orange hues, no warm glow.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been timid to order due to risk of getting one with little color. The description for this salt lamp is warm glow with orange hues, but this is so close to white. It has very little to almost no color. I truly wanted the warm orange color & glow or I would’ve ordered a white one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office and I love the added warmth it gives to my office. Live the adjustable brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love the two WBM 1000 Himalayan Light Lamps we ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the two WBM 1000 Himalayan Light Lamps we ordered and received. The items were exactly what we had envisioned (and advertised). The glow from the lands adds coziness to the environment and the dimmer switch works wonderfully since we're able to adjust to the desired light volume.
customer_reviews.author: Nelsy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Was exactly what I was hoping it would be. Love it having a dimmer. I do like my room very dark at night, so sadly I can’t have it on 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product early as a Christmas gift and put it away. At Christmas, my teen daughter opened it and it did not work. Because I did early shopping I was past the return.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how fast this started working for my son. Within two days his coughing at night is almost completely gone! I'm going to order more for the entire house to purify the air!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany s

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these. Two of them are great. The other 2 have bad cords (one turns on and off if you move the cord, the other flickers when he dimmer is turned low). I need to pack up the two defective ones and return them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baudoin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.text: Won’t turn on. I bought a new lightbulb and still isn’t working.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and it's peaceful to look at.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged the lamp in straight from the box, turned it on, and nothing happened. Even tried different outlets to be sure. Very disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Nice as a night light!
customer_reviews.text: Love the glow in the room and that you can choose the brightness. Good price as well.

customer_reviews.title: I love the light it casts at night
customer_reviews.text: I leave it on 24/7. I love the light it casts at night. Some have dimmers, if this one didn't, I added one.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda G. McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy with the second one :-(
customer_reviews.text: This is the second lamp I've bought and I gave it 5 stars the first time. However, the second lamp's bulb goes on and off randomly and will flicker and stay off if the dial is even close to dim. I had bought it for our room, but the bulb is too bright and we can't use the dimmer if we want it to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. Isn't dimmer light like I thought. Thought it came with 2 bulbs first one burned out immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp, it is huge and pretty heavy. I use it as a nite light so I can see at night when waking up.

customer_reviews.title: What i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for girlfriend it is dimmable and exactly what she wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Came with a bulb. It's perfect size for my bedroom.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good night light! I've already bought second one. I am not sure about SPA effect but the illumination is great!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a chunk of salt with a bulb and a switch. It's hard to mess that up.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I think it makes a difference. I have them in several rooms!

customer_reviews.text: it was a little squarer then the picture made it out to be but I still like it has a nice glow to it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lamp. The atmosphere it creates is wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase/
customer_reviews.text: It came wrapped well. I'm loving my lamp. The dimmer makes a great night light.

customer_reviews.title: Buy one you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light, they really do work. Great seller, fast delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase

customer_reviews.title: Love my salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. It adds ambiance to our room and I love that it has a dimmer switch. I would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a night light for the kids bedroom... Perfect!

customer_reviews.text: This unique lamp is in my bedroom and works effectively as a night light! Love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I hardly use it but it's pretty on my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Niner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This would get 5 stars, if it had a grounded plug.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It is my second one and I may buy more! I love how something so simple can make such a huge difference in how I feel! I keep it in the areas where I sit using my computer or other electronics. It has made a big difference in my SAD (seasonal affective disorder) and I am resting better (sleep has been an constant issue). I'm sure if I had one it my bedroom it would help even more, but it just puts out more light than my husband is comfortable trying to sleep with. I have a few friends now using himalayan sale lamps and it is helping their moods too! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not fell a noticeable difference but cast a nice soft glow
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, base is nicely coordinated wood, construction is very solid. And the dimmer is key! What a difference that makes. You will not regret this purchase and the price is right on point. Hope you enjoy as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: jen halpern

customer_reviews.title: Naturally Beautiful and Functional! Love the Dimmer Switch feature.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I ordered (3) different sizes of the WBM Salt Crystal lamps, and I love them all and highly recommend this item not only for its natural air purifying properties, but for the beauty and ambiance it adds to the room. What I also love about the WBM brand of salt crystal lamps is that they come with dimmer switches, which is a REALLY nice feature to have. I will probably order even more of these in the future, and definitely plan on buying some as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It gives the room a nice ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It gives the room a nice ambiance glow

customer_reviews.title: This is ok, has Some issues!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! My aunt had one while I was growing up so I thought I'd get one as I suffer from sleep-insomnia! This has worked greatly I r me on a low setting. However, the higher settings keep me awake. Another issue is the I have to turn the little turn in thing, it take forever for it to turn on then I tunes on really fast and makes a loud click sound! Other than those two problems this is a great product and I love it! I recommend it to my sister who too suffers from sleep-insomnia and she's yet to get one!

customer_reviews.title: Dimmer works nicely. My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute detail for home décor. Dimmer works nicely. My kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I have two, love them. One in the bathroom as a night light and one in the bedroom for ambiance. Also purchaser two candle holders and they make any room soft and mellow. First on I bought I had for almost 4 years before I had to get a new light build and they are on 24/7. Really good quality and no two are the same. Great for gifts too.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect in the bathroom that we have it in (Master ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect in the bathroom that we have it in (Master Bath). It does has a very small foot print, so it's not in the way on our counter. The dimmer is also quite fantastic - not too bright, while still serving as a way to light the bathroom at night so my boyfriend and I don't have to struggle with accidentally waking eachother up with the glaring, blinding bathroom lights. My only wish is that this was a blue or white salt lamp instead of the red-orange. But, c'est la vie.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Himalayan Glow 1000 Natural Salt Lamp, Amber Glow
product_meta.description:
Comes with 15-watt bulb, Dimmer switch and 6-feet electric cord. ETL-listed (complete lamp). Purify the air and beautify the home. Relax in the warm glow of this Himalayan natural salt crystal lamp. It is wholesome and good for a creative mind. Bring divine harmony to any room with this beautiful salt crystal lamp. Its therapeutic glow of orange hues infuses a natural calm bringing the mind and body to a gradual sense of tranquility and wellbeing. Experience it for yourself.

►Specification power input: 

120V/60Hzpower source: plug in bulbs: 15-watt E12 socket incandescent light bulbs.

►Package content:

☺1 x natural Himalayan salt lamp

☺1 x dimmer Switch 15W bulb (one pre-installed)

☺1 x user manual.
feature_bullets: Perfect Gift Choice: With it's gorgeous Look, it makes the perfect gift for any Holiday, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, graduations, and thank-you, Cyber Monday, Black Friday and all other special Occasions
Neem Wooden Base: Comes with 100% Natural Neem Wooden Base. Naturally Antibacterial, Better than other wooden materials. It is more durable, shrink-resistant, and termite-resistant.

Safety and Quality: It comes with a B15 Pre-Install light bulb, 6 feet cord with patented dimmer switch to adjust brightness and match the ambiance. Complete lamp is ETL Certified according to UL standards. (replacement bulbs are available for separate purchase as needed: search: “WBM light bulbs”)
Home Gift Guide: Ideal for the center of a coffee table or desk. Good for cubic office or standard bedroom. Illuminate your room with a warm, pleasant & relaxing amber glow.

Hand Made Himalayan Salt Lamp: Professionally hand-carved Himalayan rock salt from Pakistan, when lit, the lamp radiates a warm, amber glow, providing a calming atmosphere to help create a sense of peace and relaxation.

specifications.Usage: Christmas Gift, Easter, Birthday gift, New Year, Mother's day gift, Father's gift, Valentine's Day gift, Marriage Gift, Women's Day
specifications.Warranty Description: Wbm llc. Warrants its products to be free from defects in material and workmanship for 30 days from the shipment date unless otherwise noted. Wbm llc. Will replace any item returned to us within the parameters of this policy and found to be defective. All returned warranty-issue merchandise must be properly packed for a safe return shipment and in original purchase condition with the original packaging, the original receipt/invoice/packing slip and an explanation of the item's problem. Wbm llc. Will not refund, credit or cover shipping expenses for warranty item returns or warranty item replacements under any circumstances. Wbm llc. Is not liable for misuse of its products. This warranty does not cover damage due to abuse, neglect, alteration, failure to follow instructions, shipping damage or damaged packaging. Wbm llc. Expressly disclaims all express warranties not stated herein and all implied warranties, including the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars223 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
